description:
The problem: If are a high-performer or you want to be one - then you need more energy to follow through your day.

If so - then the â„–1 thing that will provide you with more energy is a better sleep. Combined with highly-effective morning tips that will give you even more energy - you will feel better than ever.

This course will help you:

  • Optimize all parameters of your sleep, get most out of every minute and make your sleep a pleasure again, even if you never thought it can be so.
  • You will reduce every major obstacle that hurts your sleep quality and find your perfect sleep duration through experimentation
  • If it's hard for you to beat the snooze button addiction - then I have great news, there's a complete module on how to wake up easily and instantly.
  • You will get external motivation for waking up with your first alarm and a lot more useful tricks, like adjusting yourself to a new sleep schedule with a first try and reseting your sleep schedule in just 1 day.
  • And a looot more.

Why it's different:

  • It's specific - it gives you specific action steps for a specific problem.
  • 90% of online courses are never watched (sure, you knew that). I condened 4 hours of material in just 30 minutes of this course, so you will go through it fast.
  • It's recorded in plain english.
  • It's multi-angled. There are different tips that you can choose and use.

The bonus: is a short habit-creating crash course. Your morning - is the part of the day to create healthy, long-term habits that will change your life and will be with you in years.

You will discover my 90%-99% habit creation strategy and will feel yourself like a cyborg that can install every habit, every skill and behaviour.

Don't Miss It: the course is FREE for a limited time and will soon become paid as more content is coming out. So enroll right now! It's short and to the point.

David Datoff.
title: The Morning Energy: Reinstall Your Sleep, Energy and Habits.
